MS MCQs

    Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

    »

    1. Suppose, you’re tasked with developing an IoT solution that requires near real-time response to local events, you would consider using IoT Edge because:

      IoT Edge can run modules locally on IoT Edge devices.

      IoT Edge is secure and can use device security features.

      IoT Edge can communicate with the cloud.


    2. Suppose, you’re tasked with monitoring the health of a diverse set of IoT devices in the field. Which component of IoT Edge would you use?

      IoT Edge modules

      IoT Edge runtime

      IoT Edge cloud interface


    3. Suppose you wanted to run machine learning applications on IoT Edge devices. IoT Edge is suitable because:

      You can train the module on the cloud and deploy to the IoT Edge as a container

      IoT Edge allows you to run applications on the IoT Edge even when connectivity is intermittent.

      IoT Edge is always connected to the cloud.
